meanings.sent1: She is the leadier player on the team, always taking charge.
meanings.sent2: The new car is leadier than the old one.
meanings.sent3: The leadier cat in the house always gets the best spot by the window.
meanings.sent4: His leadier approach to problem-solving helped the team succeed.
meanings.sent5: The leadier mountain stood tall against the sky.

meanings.definition: One who leads or guides others
meanings.sent1: The leadier of the hiking group showed us the right path.
meanings.sent2: She was chosen as the leadier of the project team.
meanings.sent3: The leadier of the ducks led them in a funny dance around the pond.
meanings.sent4: The leadier of the orchestra directed the musicians with precision.
meanings.sent5: The leadier in the fairy tale guided the lost children home.
